posts.post_content:
Posted By: paulstratton
Would like to trade this duplicate Ellis for another tough T207.  One of the toughest cards in the set IMO.  Some problems, but it has a nice image and readable back. Trade only at this time. Email with any interest. 

[IMG]http://i190.photobucket.com/albums/z105/pstratt63/T207%20Brown%20Background/scan0041-1.jpg[/IMG] 
[IMG]http://i190.photobucket.com/albums/z105/pstratt63/T207%20Brown%20Background/scan0042-1.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Tim Newcomb
It is one of the toughest cards, despite being a Recruit back.  Nice card!
